document_data.mainbody:
arrig Cymrych I was High King of the Moonshae Isles in the mid-to-late 3 century DR.
He was a member of the Cymrych Dynasty and the second son of the dynastyâ€™s legendary namesake, Cymrych Hugh. He was the brother of both of his immediate predecessors High King Warren I followed by High Queen Tamara. Carrig Is successor was his first son, Gwylloch Cymrych, while his second son, Gorham, would become High King after Gwylloch.
Carrig I assumed the throne of the High King in Callidyrr during the , after the poisoning of his sister, High Queen Tamara. At the time, Cedric Riker ruled in the familys ancestral seat of Corwell as its regent, and would do so until the ninth year of his reign.
Carrig I ruled for twenty-four years before dying in battle against Northmen invaders from  Tuern and Gundarlun in the .
